summary: This is an email from attorney Sigrid McCawley forwarding a subpoena related to Shopper's Travel, referencing prior legal objections and lack of received documents. It appears to be part of discovery or investigation efforts in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP who is sending a subpoena related to Shopper's Travel and referencing prior legal objections.

events.title: Shopper's Travel Subpoena Served
events.description: A subpoena was served on Shopper's Travel, which hired lawyers and raised objections, resulting in no documents being received.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to Shopper's Travel on April 26, 2016.
Shopper's Travel hired lawyers and raised objections to the subpoena, preventing document production.
Sigrid McCawley, a partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP, is involved in efforts to obtain documents from Shopper's Travel.
The email suggests ongoing investigation or discovery efforts related to travel arrangements in the Epstein case.
